title: WHA-WHAT HAPPENED TO PBE SIGNUPS???
body: Just wanted to ask what happened to the pbe signup, where did it go and how come I can't apply for it??? I would appreciate any helpful response from our loving community

replies.body: Thanks for your interest in the PBE Server! Due to many bugs with the website, we've currently shut it down (temporarily) while we investigate and make quality improvements. During this time, players won't be able to sign up for the PBE or create PBE accounts.
